thread.title: Fox, National Geographic expand partnership in $725 mln deal
thread.title_full: Fox, National Geographic expand partnership in $725 mln deal | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Fox, National Geographic expand partnership in $725 mln deal
text:
Sept 9 Twenty-First Century Fox Inc said it will expand its 18-year partnership of operating National Geographic TV channels to include the latter's magazines and digital platforms, in a deal valued at $725 million.
Fox will own 73 percent of the joint venture and the National Geographic Society the rest.
The deal will increase the non-profit National Geographic Society's endowment to nearly $1 billion, the partners said. (Reporting by Sai Sachin R in Bengaluru; Editing by Ted Kerr )
